name: ARKA - Episode.0: O.B.A.M.A - 3D
description:
====================================================

Obama 3D, a 2022 demo by BabyPinkSnail. Inspired by: https://colonel-sandwich.itch.io/outride-obama a game by my good friend Colonel Sandwich

If you find any bugs or other problems please share and I'll try to fix!

====================================================

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys: Foward, Backward and Strafe.

Q/E: Turn

Page UP/DOWN: Look Up/Down

(You can also look up, down and turn using the mouse)

F4: Full-Screen

F5: Reset Game

(There is no option to quit in-game, so just click the X in the top right of the window, or use Alt+F4)

====================================================

Difficulty Settings:

- Easy -

Obama - Stutter 3/3

Mini-Map - Shows Player + Obama | Doesn't Shut Down After Obtaining All Shinys

Shiny Count - 5

Flashlight - Bright

- Normal -

Obama - Stutter 2/3

Mini-Map - Shows Player Only | Shuts Down After Obtaining All Shinys

Shiny Count - 8

Flashlight - Normal

- Hard -

Obama - Stutter 1/3

Mini-Map - Shows Player + Obama (Updates slower than Easy/Isn't realtime) | Doesn't Shut Down After Obtaining All Shinys, But Obama's Position Updates Even Slower

Shiny Count - 8

Flashlight -None
